column5: Does anyone know of any decent shore lunch spots on Dinorwic lake? Preferably toward the south end? Thanks.

Toward the south end there are a few good lunch spots. However, they are a bit further south than Dinorwic. On Rock Lake half way down the east side is a sandy beach. In turtle pond, as you enter turn left and go about 1/4th mile and keep left, there is a spot around the corner. Also, if you enter into Staniwan, Keep to the right, between the Penensula and a island, OH heck send me an email and I will send you a map.
